document.full_text: president bashar al-assad, facing the gravest crisis in his 11-year rule, deployed the army in syria's main port of latakia for the first time after nearly two weeks of protests spread across the country.
document.title: syria's assad deploys army in port to keep order
lines_and_colors: president bashar al-assad, facing the gravest crisis in his 11-year rule, deployed the army in syria's main port of latakia for the first time after nearly two weeks of protests spread across the country.
